patthana15.61:1.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati
patthana15.61:1.1_1: hetupaccayā. Nasukhasahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo
patthana15.61:1.1_2: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhasahagataṁ kusalañca nasukhasahagataṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ
patthana15.61:1.1_3: paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.61:2.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati
patthana15.61:2.1_1: hetupaccayā. Nasukhasahagataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo
patthana15.61:2.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhasahagataṁ akusalañca nasukhasahagataṁ akusalañca
patthana15.61:2.1_3: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi
